Title: EZSA-2018-006 XSS vulnerability in 'disabled module' error template
Description: EZSA-2018-006 XSS vulnerability in 'disabled module' error template
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 2018.9.0 before 2018.9.1.2, all versions starting from 2018.6.0 before 2018.6.1.3, all versions starting from 2011.0.0 before 2017.12.4.2, all versions starting from 5.4.0 before 5.4.12.2, all versions starting from 5.3.0 before 5.3.12.5
NotImpacted: All versions before 2018.9.0, all versions starting from 2018.9.1.2, all versions before 2018.6.0, all versions starting from 2018.6.1.3, all versions before 2011.0.0, all versions starting from 2017.12.4.2, all versions before 5.4.0, all versions starting from 5.4.12.2, all versions before 5.3.0, all versions starting from 5.3.12.5
